headline.print_headline: Maker Pulls Pesticide Amid Fear Of Toxicity
headline.seo: Pesticide Pulled from U.S. Market Amid Fear of Toxicity
headline.main: Maker Pulls Pesticide Amid Fear of Toxicity

docs.snippet: The controversial soil fumigant, known as methyl iodide and sold under the label Midas, will be withdrawn immediately....
docs.abstract: Arysta LifeScience Corporation pulls its controversial methyl iodide pesticide from the American market, surprising both growers and environmentalists who had warned that it posed serious hazards.
docs.lead_paragraph: The controversial soil fumigant, known as methyl iodide and sold under the label Midas, will be withdrawn immediately.

headline.print_headline: Calls Grow For Leader Of Komen To Step Down
headline.seo: Calls Grow for Leader of Susan G. Komen for the Cure to Resign
headline.main: Calls Grow for Leader of Komen to Step Down

docs.snippet: The resignation of the chief executive of the group’s New York affiliate added to pressure on Nancy G. Brinker to step down after a controversy over financing for Planned Parenthood....

keywords.value: Komen, Susan G, for the Cure
keywords.name: organizations

docs.abstract: Calls mount for the resignation of Nancy G Brinker, founder and chief executive of the Susan G Komen for the Cure breast cancer charity, after a second executive at the institution resigns; departure of Dara P Richardson-Heron follows that of executive vice president Katrina McGhee; foundation attracted widespread ire after it temporarily eliminated most of its financing to Planned Parenthood.
docs.lead_paragraph: The resignation of the chief executive of the group’s New York affiliate added to pressure on Nancy G. Brinker to step down after a controversy over financing for Planned Parenthood.

docs.snippet: Corrections appearing in print on March 22, 2012....
docs.lead_paragraph: Corrections appearing in print on March 22, 2012.

headline.print_headline: For Romney’s Trusted Adviser, ‘Etch a Sketch’ Comment Is a Rare Misstep
headline.seo: ‘Etch A Sketch’ Remark a Rare Misstep for Romney Adviser
headline.main: For Romney’s Trusted Adviser, ‘Etch A Sketch’ Comment Is a Rare Misstep

docs.snippet: Eric Fehrnstrom has been a defiant defender when Mitt Romney has been accused of being a flip-flopper....
docs.abstract: Botched comparison of Mitt Romney's public image to an Etch A Sketch is an uncharacteristic gaffe for Eric Fehrnstrom, whose longtime role as a chief adviser to Romney has been marked by precision and caution; misstep is particularly curious because Fehrnstrom has strongly opposed portrayals of Romney as a flip-flopper with no core principles.
docs.lead_paragraph: Eric Fehrnstrom has been a defiant defender when Mitt Romney has been accused of being a flip-flopper.

docs.snippet: Rodney Williams and Andre Hollins each scored 24 points to help visiting Minnesota advance to the semifinals of the N.I.T. on Wednesday with a 78-72 win over Middle Tennessee....
docs.abstract: Minnesota advances to the NIT men's basketball semifinals with a 78-72 win over Middle Tennessee; Stanford overwhelms Nevada, 84-56, to also advance; other college basketball results noted.
docs.lead_paragraph: Rodney Williams and Andre Hollins each scored 24 points to help visiting Minnesota advance to the semifinals of the N.I.T. on Wednesday with a 78-72 win over Middle Tennessee.

headline.print_headline: McDonald’s Says Its Chief Will Retire This Summer
headline.seo: McDonald’s Chief, Jim Skinner, to Retire This Summer
headline.main: McDonald’s Says Its Chief Will Retire This Summer

docs.snippet: Jim Skinner, who took the helm in 2004, has steered a floundering McDonald’s to the best financial performance in its history....
docs.abstract: McDonald's chief executive Jim Skinner will retire in summer 2012; chief operating officer Don Thompson will succeed him.
docs.lead_paragraph: Jim Skinner, who took the helm in 2004, has steered a floundering McDonald’s to the best financial performance in its history.

docs.snippet: Want to understand conservatives, or temporarily become one? Try washing your hands carefully with soap and water....
docs.abstract: Nicholas D Kristof Op-Ed column expounds on book The Righteous Mind by Jonathan Haidt, which illustrates the different moral criteria exhibited in liberals and conservatives; notes book contends conservatives emphasize values, like loyalty, respect for authority and sanctity, that liberals generally lack, therefore concluding this is why liberals have trouble understanding conservatives or crafting messages that resonate with them.
docs.lead_paragraph: Want to understand conservatives, or temporarily become one? Try washing your hands carefully with soap and water.

headline.print_headline: Though Pace Is Picking Up, a Builder’s Pay Is Not
headline.seo: Though the Pace Is Picking Up, a Builder’s Pay Is Not
headline.main: Though Pace Is Picking Up, a Builder’s Pay Is Not

docs.snippet: A builder’s optimism is unshaken, despite the new reality of smaller, lower-paying jobs....
docs.abstract: General contractor Peter Schneider has struggled to keep his business afloat following the collapse of the housing market, but remains optimistic about the future; Schneider has taken a series of smaller, lower-paying jobs in the meantime, believing that a comeback is inevitable.
docs.lead_paragraph: A builder’s optimism is unshaken, despite the new reality of smaller, lower-paying jobs.

headline.print_headline: Here’s to Mr. Coffee, Known to Some as Sam
headline.seo: Here’s to Mr. Coffee, Known to Some as Sam
headline.main: Here’s to Mr. Coffee, Known to Some as Sam

docs.snippet: Thanks to Samuel Glazer and his business partner, who founded an automatic drip coffee machine for home use, America was able to make an easier, better pot of coffee....
docs.abstract: Editorial memorializes the late Samuel Glazer, who co-invented the Mr Coffee automatic drip coffee maker; notes Glazer's product revolutionized how coffee was made across America in 1972, banishing the percolator to the dustbin.
docs.lead_paragraph: Thanks to Samuel Glazer and his business partner, who founded an automatic drip coffee machine for home use, America was able to make an easier, better pot of coffee.

headline.print_headline: With a Strong Spring, Hughes Makes His Case
headline.main: With a Strong Spring, Hughes Makes His Case

docs.snippet: Of the potential starters vying for one of five rotation spots, Phil Hughes has perhaps pitched the best for the Yankees in spring training....
docs.lead_paragraph: Of the potential starters vying for one of five rotation spots, Phil Hughes has perhaps pitched the best for the Yankees in spring training.
